events.message: I received the wrong item in my recent order and would like to arrange a refund as soon as possible.
The case has been categorized under the 'Refund' cluster based on the customer's request for money back.
Support agent Sarah T. has been assigned to assist with the refund case related to the incorrect item delivery.
Hello! Iâ€™m Sarah, here to help with your refund request. Could you please provide the order number and photos of the item you received?
Could you please share the order number and a clear photo of the incorrect item you received to proceed with the refund process?
Thank you for responding. My order number is 893274, and I have attached the photos of the item that arrived which is not what I ordered.
We have reviewed your photos and order details. We will process your full refund within 3-5 business days after you return the incorrect item using our prepaid shipping label.
Thank you for the quick response and clear instructions. I will send the item back today using the label provided.
The returned item was received and the refund has been processed successfully. You should see the amount credited back to your original payment method shortly.
Just checking in to confirm that the refund has appeared in your account. Please let us know if everything is satisfactory or if you need any further assistance.
Since there have been no further replies, we are closing this refund case. Thank you for contacting support and we hope to assist you again in the future.
